/* VacationMapper.ListVacation */
SELECT V.VACATION_ID, V.EMPLOYEE_ID, V.WORK_HISTORY_ID, V.VACATION_TYPE_CODE, CD.CODE_NAME AS VACATION_TYPE_CODE_NAME, V.VACATION_CONTENT, V.VACATION_START_YMD, V.VACATION_END_YMD, V.VACATION_USE_COUNT, V.DELETE_YN FROM HM_VACATION V LEFT JOIN CO_CODE CD ON CD.CODE_VALUE = V.VACATION_TYPE_CODE AND CD.UP_CODE_ID = 'VACATION_TYPE_00' WHERE V.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND V.WORK_HISTORY_ID = ?WorkHistoryId
AND V.VACATION_START_YMD >= ?VacationStartYmd
AND V.VACATION_END_YMD <= ?VacationEndYmd
ORDER BY V.VACATION_START_YMD DESC, V.VACATION_END_YMD DESC

/* VacationMapper.GetVacation */
SELECT V.VACATION_ID, V.EMPLOYEE_ID, V.WORK_HISTORY_ID, V.VACATION_TYPE_CODE, V.VACATION_CONTENT, V.VACATION_START_YMD, V.VACATION_END_YMD, V.VACATION_USE_COUNT, V.DELETE_YN FROM HM_VACATION V WHERE V.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND V.VACATION_ID = ?VacationId

/* VacationMapper.AddVacation */
INSERT INTO HM_VACATION ( EMPLOYEE_ID, WORK_HISTORY_ID, VACATION_TYPE_CODE, VACATION_CONTENT, VACATION_START_YMD, VACATION_END_YMD, VACATION_USE_COUNT, CREATER_ID ) VALUES ( ?EmployeeId, ?WorkHistoryId, ?VacationTypeCode, ?VacationContent, ?VacationStartYmd, ?VacationEndYmd, IFNULL( ?VacationUseCount, FN_GET_VACATION_USE_COUNT(?VacationStartYmd, ?VacationEndYmd, ?VacationTypeCode, ?CreaterId) ), ?CreaterId ) ;SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

/* VacationMapper.UpdateVacation */
UPDATE HM_VACATION SET VACATION_TYPE_CODE = ?VacationTypeCode, VACATION_CONTENT = ?VacationContent, VACATION_START_YMD = ?VacationStartYmd, VACATION_END_YMD = ?VacationEndYmd, VACATION_USE_COUNT = IFNULL( ?VacationUseCount, FN_GET_VACATION_USE_COUNT(?VacationStartYmd, ?VacationEndYmd, ?VacationTypeCode, ?UpdaterId) ), UPDATER_ID = ?UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE VACATION_ID = ?VacationId

/* VacationMapper.RemoveVacation */
UPDATE HM_VACATION SET DELETE_YN = 'Y', UPDATER_ID = ?UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE VACATION_ID = ?VacationId

/* VacationMapper.GetVacationCountInfo */
WITH VACATION_CALC AS ( SELECT VC.WORK_HISTORY_ID, VC.VACATION_TYPE_CODE FROM HM_VACATION_CALC VC LEFT JOIN HM_WORK_HISTORY H ON H.WORK_HISTORY_ID = VC.WORK_HISTORY_ID WHERE VC.WORK_HISTORY_ID = ?WorkHistoryId AND VC.ANNUAL_TYPE_CODE = FN_GET_ANNUAL_TYPE_CODE(H.JOIN_YMD, H.QUIT_YMD) ) SELECT IFNULL(T.VACATION_USE_COUNT, 0) AS VACATION_USE_COUNT, IFNULL(FN_GET_VACATION_TOTAL_COUNT(T.JOIN_YMD, T.QUIT_YMD, T.ANNUAL_TYPE_CODE), 0) AS VACATION_TOTAL_COUNT, IFNULL(FN_GET_VACATION_REMAIN_COUNT(T.JOIN_YMD, T.QUIT_YMD, T.ANNUAL_TYPE_CODE, IFNULL(T.VACATION_USE_COUNT, 0)), 0) AS VACATION_REMAIN_COUNT FROM ( SELECT H.JOIN_YMD, H.QUIT_YMD, V.VACATION_START_YMD, V.VACATION_END_YMD, V.VACATION_TYPE_CODE, FN_GET_ANNUAL_TYPE_CODE(H.JOIN_YMD, H.QUIT_YMD) AS ANNUAL_TYPE_CODE, SUM(FN_GET_VACATION_USE_COUNT(V.VACATION_START_YMD, V.VACATION_END_YMD, V.VACATION_TYPE_CODE, ?UserId)) AS VACATION_USE_COUNT FROM HM_VACATION V LEFT JOIN ( SELECT H1.WORK_HISTORY_ID, IFNULL(H1.JOIN_YMD, (SELECT JOIN_YMD FROM HM_WORK_HISTORY WHERE WORK_HISTORY_ID = ?WorkHistoryId)) AS JOIN_YMD, IFNULL(H1.QUIT_YMD, (SELECT QUIT_YMD FROM HM_WORK_HISTORY WHERE WORK_HISTORY_ID = ?WorkHistoryId)) AS QUIT_YMD FROM HM_WORK_HISTORY H1 WHERE H1.DELETE_YN = 'N' ) H ON H.WORK_HISTORY_ID = V.WORK_HISTORY_ID LEFT JOIN VACATION_CALC VC ON VC.WORK_HISTORY_ID = H.WORK_HISTORY_ID WHERE V.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND H.WORK_HISTORY_ID = ?WorkHistoryId AND (V.VACATION_TYPE_CODE = VC.VACATION_TYPE_CODE OR VC.VACATION_TYPE_CODE IS NULL) ) T

/* VacationMapper.ListVacationByMonth */
WITH RECURSIVE MONTH_RANGE AS ( SELECT DATE(CONCAT(?YYYY, '-01-01')) AS YMD UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(YMD, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) FROM MONTH_RANGE WHERE DATE_ADD(YMD, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) <= DATE(CONCAT(?YYYY, '-12-31')) ) SELECT IFNULL(SUM(V.VACATION_USE_COUNT), 0) AS VACATION_USE_COUNT, DATE_FORMAT(MR.YMD, '%m') AS VACATION_MONTH FROM MONTH_RANGE MR LEFT JOIN ( SELECT V1.VACATION_END_YMD, V1.VACATION_USE_COUNT FROM HM_VACATION V1 WHERE V1.WORK_HISTORY_ID = ?WorkHistoryId AND V1.VACATION_TYPE_CODE = ?VacationTypeCode AND DATE_FORMAT(V1.VACATION_END_YMD, '%Y') = ?YYYY ) V ON MONTH(V.VACATION_END_YMD) = MONTH(MR.YMD) AND YEAR(V.VACATION_END_YMD) = YEAR(MR.YMD) GROUP BY MR.YMD ORDER BY MR.YMD
